Trade/Device Name(s): FreeStyle Libre 2 Flash Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): iOS smartphone with FreeStyle Libre 2 App
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FreeStyle Libre 2 Flash Glucose Monitoring System and App for continuous interstitial fluid glucose measurement in diabetic patients age 4 and older.
Indications for Use Summary: Continuous glucose monitoring device with real time alarms for management of diabetes in persons age 4 and older, intended to replace blood glucose testing for treatment decisions, aids in detecting hyperglycemia and hypoglycemia, and can communicate with digitally connected devices.
